point.label: WMax
point.description: Setting for maximum power output. Default to WRtg.

point.label: WMax_SF
point.description: Scale factor for real power.

point.label: VMax
point.description: Setpoint for maximum voltage.

point.label: VMin
point.description: Setpoint for minimum voltage.

point.label: VMinMax_SF
point.description: Scale factor for min/max voltages.

point.label: VAMax
point.description: Setpoint for maximum apparent power. Default to VARtg.

point.label: VAMax_SF
point.description: Scale factor for apparent power.

point.label: VArMaxQ1
point.description: Setting for maximum reactive power in quadrant 1. Default to VArRtgQ1.

point.label: VArMaxQ2
point.description: Setting for maximum reactive power in quadrant 2. Default to VArRtgQ2.

point.label: VArMaxQ3
point.description: Setting for maximum reactive power in quadrant 3. Default to VArRtgQ3.

point.label: VArMaxQ4
point.description: Setting for maximum reactive power in quadrant 4. Default to VArRtgQ4.

point.label: VArMax_SF
point.description: Scale factor for reactive power.

point.label: VRef
point.description: Voltage at the PCC.

point.label: VRef_SF
point.description: Scale factor for voltage at the PCC.

point.label: VRefOfs
point.description: Offset from PCC to inverter.

point.label: VRefOfs_SF
point.description: Scale factor for offset voltage.

point.label: WGra
point.description: Default ramp rate of change of active power due to command or internal action.

point.label: WGra_SF
point.description: Scale factor for default ramp rate.

point.label: PFMinQ1
point.description: Setpoint for minimum power factor value in quadrant 1. Default to PFRtgQ1.

point.label: PFMinQ2
point.description: Setpoint for minimum power factor value in quadrant 2. Default to PFRtgQ2.

point.label: PFMinQ3
point.description: Setpoint for minimum power factor value in quadrant 3. Default to PFRtgQ3.

point.label: PFMinQ4
point.description: Setpoint for minimum power factor value in quadrant 4. Default to PFRtgQ4.

point.label: PFMin_SF
point.description: Scale factor for minimum power factor.

point.label: VArAct
point.description: VAR action on change between charging and discharging: 1=switch 2=maintain VAR characterization.

point.label: ClcTotVA
point.description: Calculation method for total apparent power. 1=vector 2=arithmetic.

point.label: MaxRmpRte
point.description: Setpoint for maximum ramp rate as percentage of nominal maximum ramp rate. This setting will limit the rate that watts delivery to the grid can increase or decrease in response to intermittent PV generation.

point.label: MaxRmpRte_SF
point.description: Scale factor for maximum ramp percentage.

point.label: ECPNomHz
point.description: Setpoint for nominal frequency at the ECP.

point.label: ECPNomHz_SF
point.description: Scale factor for nominal frequency.

point.label: ConnPh
point.description: Identity of connected phase for single phase inverters. A=1 B=2 C=3.
